info.title: Reply API
info.description: API for managing email sequences, contacts, and automation workflows

get.description: Returns a list of all sequences in your account
Returns sequence details by ID
Returns a list of all steps in a sequence

200.description: List of sequence steps retrieved successfully

post.description: Creates a new step in a sequence

get.description: Returns details of a specific sequence step

post.description: Enables a variant of a sequence step
Disables a variant of a sequence step

get.description: Returns a list of all sequence schedules

200.description: List of sequence schedules retrieved successfully

get.description: Returns the default sequence schedule settings

post.description: Creates a new schedule for a sequence

get.description: Returns a list of all contacts in your account
Returns contact details by ID

patch.description: Updates an existing contact including status changes

get.description: Returns contacts matching the email search criteria
Returns a list of all sequences associated with a contact

post.description: Adds a contact to a sequence

delete.description: Removes a contact from a specific sequence

post.description: Adds a contact to a specific sequence

delete.description: Removes a contact from a specific sequence
Removes a contact from all sequences

204.description: Contact removed from all sequences successfully

get.description: Returns a list of all contact lists
Returns list details by ID
Returns lists matching the name search criteria

get.summary: List all contacts in a list
get.description: Returns all contacts in a specific list

post.description: Adds one or more contacts to a list

delete.summary: Remove a contact from a list
delete.description: Removes a specific contact from a list

get.description: Returns a list of all email templates
Returns template details by ID
Returns statistics for a specific contact
Returns the status of a contact in a specific sequence
Returns statistics about contacts sent per sequence
Returns statistics for a specific step in a sequence
Returns click statistics for a sequence
Returns a list of all blacklisted domains and emails
Returns a list of all blacklisted domains

post.description: Adds one or more domains to the blacklist

get.description: Checks if a specific domain is blacklisted

delete.description: Removes a domain from the blacklist

get.description: Returns a list of all blacklisted email addresses

post.description: Adds one or more email addresses to the blacklist

get.description: Checks if a specific email address is blacklisted

delete.description: Removes an email address from the blacklist

get.description: Returns a list of all email accounts
Returns email account details by ID
Returns a list of all shared pages
Returns shared page details by ID
Returns a list of all email messages
Returns email details by ID
Returns the content of an email message
Returns a list of all webhook subscriptions
Returns webhook subscription details by ID
Returns logs for a webhook subscription
Generates a report about email activities
Downloads a generated report by ID
Returns a report of contacts with status changes

200.description: Contact status changes report retrieved successfully

get.description: Returns a list of all branded links
Returns branded link details by ID
